verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines לָֽקְח֔וּ <S%H3947><s%> took אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיְבִאֻ֛הוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought מֵאֶ֥בֶן הָעֵ֖זֶר <S%H72><s%> it from Ebenezer אַשְׁדּֽוֹדָה׃ <S%H795><s%> unto Ashdod

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> took פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> When the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> they brought אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> it into the house דָּג֑וֹן <S%H1712><s%> of Dagon וַיַּצִּ֥יגוּ <S%H3322><s%> and set אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> it by דָּגֽוֹן׃ <S%H1712><s%> Dagon

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֤מוּ <S%H7925><s%> arose early אַשְׁדּוֹדִים֙ <S%H796><s%> And when they of Ashdod מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold דָג֗וֹן <S%H1712><s%> behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the earth לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּג֔וֹן <S%H1712><s%> Dagon וַיָּשִׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> again אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לִמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> him in his place

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣מוּ <S%H7925><s%> And when they arose early בַבֹּקֶר֮ <S%H1242><s%> morning מִֽמָּחֳרָת֒ <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold דָג֗וֹן <S%H1712><s%> behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> and the head דָּג֜וֹן <S%H1712><s%> of Dagon וּשְׁתֵּ֣י ׀ <S%H8147><s%> and both כַּפּ֣וֹת <S%H3709><s%> the palms יָדָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands כְּרֻתוֹת֙ <S%H3772><s%> [were] cut off אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַמִּפְתָּ֔ן <S%H4670><s%> upon the threshold רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> but דָּג֖וֹן <S%H1712><s%> only [the stump of] Dagon נִשְׁאַ֥ר <S%H7604><s%> was left עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither יִדְרְכוּ֩ <S%H1869><s%> tread כֹהֲנֵ֨י <S%H3548><s%> Therefore neither the priests דָג֜וֹן <S%H1712><s%> of Dagon וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבָּאִ֧ים <S%H935><s%> nor any that come בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house דָּג֛וֹן <S%H1712><s%> into Dagon's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִפְתַּ֥ן <S%H4670><s%> on the threshold דָּג֖וֹן <S%H1712><s%> of Dagon בְּאַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <S%H795><s%> in Ashdod עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this ס

וַתִּכְבַּ֧ד <S%H3513><s%> was heavy יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> But the hand יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָאַשְׁדּוֹדִ֖ים <S%H796><s%> upon them of Ashdod וַיְשִׁמֵּ֑ם <S%H8074><s%> and he destroyed וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> them and smote אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> [בָּעֳפָלִים כ] (בַּטְּחֹרִ֔ים <S%H6076><s%> stronghold ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <S%H795><s%> [even] Ashdod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> and the coasts

וַיִּרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H582><s%> And when the men אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <S%H795><s%> of Ashdod כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was כֵ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> so וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> that [it was] so they said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> must not יֵשֵׁ֞ב <S%H3427><s%> shall not abide אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> The ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָשְׁתָ֤ה <S%H7185><s%> is sore יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> with us for his hand עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on דָּג֥וֹן <S%H1712><s%> upon us and upon Dagon אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our god

וַיִּשְׁלְח֡וּ <S%H7971><s%> They sent וַיַּאַסְפוּ֩ <S%H622><s%> therefore and gathered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סַרְנֵ֨י <S%H5633><s%> all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> unto them and said מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נַּעֲשֶׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> What shall we do לַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> with the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said גַּ֣ת <S%H1661><s%> unto Gath יִסֹּ֔ב <S%H5437><s%> be carried about אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> Let the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּסֵּ֕בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרֵ֣י ׀ <S%H310><s%> And it was [so] that after הֵסַ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> they had carried it about אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> the hand יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> was against the city מְהוּמָה֙ <S%H4103><s%> destruction גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> with a very וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city מִקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> both small וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and great וַיִּשָּׂתְר֥וּ <S%H8368><s%> in their secret parts לָהֶ֖ם [עֳפָלִים כ] (טְחֹרִֽים׃ <S%H6076><s%> stronghold ק)

וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֛וּ <S%H7971><s%> Therefore they sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God עֶקְר֑וֹן <S%H6138><s%> to Ekron וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> came אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> And it came to pass as the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God עֶקְר֔וֹן <S%H6138><s%> to Ekron וַיִּזְעֲק֨וּ <S%H2199><s%> cried out הָֽעֶקְרֹנִ֜ים <S%H6139><s%> that the Ekronites לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֵסַ֤בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> They have brought about אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַהֲמִיתֵ֖נִי <S%H4191><s%> to us to slay וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> us and our people

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> So they sent וַיַּאַסְפ֜וּ <S%H622><s%> and gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and said שַׁלְּח֞וּ <S%H7971><s%> Send away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> and let it go again לִמְקֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> to his own place וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> so יָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> that it slay אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> us not and our people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become מְהֽוּמַת־ <S%H4103><s%> destruction מָ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> for there was a deadly בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> throughout all the city כָּבְדָ֥ה <S%H3513><s%> heavy מְאֹ֛ד <S%H3966><s%> was very יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְהָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> and the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מֵ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> that died הֻכּ֖וּ <S%H5221><s%> not were smitten [בָּעֳפָלִים כ] (בַּטְּחֹרִ֑ים <S%H6076><s%> stronghold ק) וַתַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up שַֽׁוְעַ֥ת <S%H7775><s%> and the cry הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> to heaven
